'''Bounty of the Earth''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[The Hero's Journey]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect 200 rewards from [[Ley Line Blossom|blossoms of wealth or blossoms of revelation]].

==Notes==
*Unlike the [[Battle Pass]] weekly mission, the rewards must be collected using [[Resin]].
*Using [[Condensed Resin]] will only cause the counter to go up by 1 instead of 2, even though twice the amount of resin was used.
